mv X y.go
-- x.go --
package p

import "m/q"

var X int = q.Q
var _ = X
-- y.go --
package p
-- q/q.go --
package q

var Q int
-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -1,4 +1,3 @@
 package p

-var X int
 var _ = X
diff old/y.go new/y.go
--- old/y.go
+++ new/y.go
@@ -1 +1,3 @@
 package p
+
+var X int
